title: Mobile-Based Marketing Curriculum Innovation: Strategic Redesign and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic marketing terminology and comprehension of online communication
context.additional_context: A course designed for smartphone-centric learners to acquire core marketing competencies rapidly, featuring real-world cases from practicing marketing experts and mobile-friendly content.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and compare basic strategies for digital marketing channels (SEO, SNS, influencers) within four weeks
Learners can create customized content proposals for target customer segments in mobile environments
Learners can submit measurable marketing campaign drafts within budget constraints through practical assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
